--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Richard Turner" <ikkanshi@w...> 
wrote:
> Hi all, I just picked up a copy of Tsuba Kanshoki ( 2nd Edition ) 
form Alan Bale after Jim G recommended it to me and it is absolutly 
fantastic. 

Rich -

Yes, Tsuba Kanshoki is excellent. Be careful of the binding.
Being a heavy book, the back tends to break rather easily.
For you next tsuba book, I'd suggest the Tsuba Taikan.

Rich S
